title: Tasting Menu
overview: A year ago, just before his break, Marc and Rachel manage to book a table at one of the best restaurants in the world, reserve to which none of them is willing to give. In this idyllic corner of the Costa Brava will find connoisseurs worldwide. Together they share one of the best sensory experiences of his life. It will be an unforgettable evening.

production_companies.name: Instituto de la Cinematografía y de las Artes Audiovisuales (ICAA)
